# 1.

Sketch the graphs of the following functions.  Make sure to include any pertinent aspects of the graph such as asymptotes (vertical/horizontal), domain, local extrema, regions of increase and decrease, points of inflection, intervals of concavity and $x$ and $y$ intercepts.


a. $f(x) = \displaystyle\frac{x^2}{9-x^2}$

b. $f(x) = 3x^4-4x^3$

a. $f(x) = x^4 - 6x^2$

b. $f(x) = (x^2-1)^3$

c. $f(x) = x\sqrt{x^2+1}$

d. $f(x) = \displaystyle\frac{x}{(x-1)^2}$
